alert.note: Alert for Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 19 at 2:53PM CST until January 20 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...Coastal Aransas, Coastal San Patricio, Coastal Refugio and Coastal Calhoun Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio
